The geranium in the window the smell of Mama's medicines.
Mais l'absence de géranium à la fenêtre... ou tout autre objet... sera un signe de refus de coopération de votre part.
But the geranium's absence from the window sill, or its substitution by some other object, will be taken as a sign that you refuse to cooperate.
